patthana18.5:4.1: Hetuṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:5.1: Hetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:6.1: Nahetuṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:7.1: Hetuṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:7.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.5:8.1: Hetuṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:8.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana18.5:9.1: Hetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:10.1: Hetuṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:11.1: Hetuṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:12.1: Hetuṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:13.1: Nahetuṃ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:14.1: Nahetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:15.1: Hetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:15.2: Nahetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:15.3: Hetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavañca nahetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.5:16.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
